channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bird fouling at bus stop, 4th January
item.description:
The path and bus stop is completely covered in bird poop. Unhygienic to be walking through this every day and no way to avoid

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Central Way, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas canister, 4th January
item.description:
I have just witness a car pull up and dump two maybe three laughing gas canister from there car and drive off i took the reg number which i will not put on here but if the council is interested I can forward them the number.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivedon Road, Welling, Greater London

item.title: Glass litter William Camden pub, 4th January
item.description:
Lots of glass on pavement and empty bottle plastic cups on pavement wall of William Camden pub. The glass is on the pavement been there for a few days. Why isn’t the William Camden looking after their premises. Also the small brown bin and litter still sitting on the grass verge by the tree Avenue Road Pickford road? Been there for days reported this but no action as yet?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 4th January
item.description:
There is a large pothole right at the junction between the kerb and the road island. It has been there for months. Can it be fixed please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Avenue Road, Southgate, Greater London
